website_summaries.verdict: Though it has limited compatibility, it has a lot to offer, especially if you are looking for a smart model that is uncomplicated and easy to sync.
pros: A recently re-vamped bulb that syncs easily to Bluetooth capable smartphones and tablets
We love the sunrise and sunset modes that are easy to customize for gradual brightness and dimming
Has multi-color lights in addition to varying shades of white
cons: Not as compatible as other bulbs – doesn't work with Alexa or Echo
Occasionally fails to recognize settings such as alarm on and off modes
Reports of connection drops requiring reset

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS AND MOVE INTO THE 21ST CENTURY!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS LIGHT BULB!! I bought (and returned) two different sunrise clocks trying to find something that would wake me up with light. Then I realized that the clocks are old school - very antiquated technology. This is the way to go, I'm so glad I took the chance. This is completely controlled by my smartphone. I can make the light any color, and even have it keep with the beat of the music I am listening to. But I really primarily use it for the sunrise and sunset effect, which helps me keep a healthy sleep cycle. This is a fun, really innovative technology that we are glad we added to our house.
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent "wake up" light!
customer_reviews.text: Living in Wisconsin the dark mornings really make it hard to get out of bed. I used to have a stand alone phillips wake up light, which was great, but this is better because it doesn't clutter up my nightstand. I just screwed it into my bedside lamp and programmed it in my phone to gradually turn on at the same time each morning. I also like using it at night because I can make the light really bright for reading or dim it really low for a softer ambient light. The other features (colors, strobing, etc) are fun but I personally haven't used them.
customer_reviews.author: Merrick Falls

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: After a year of decent performance (under half the advertised lifetime of 2.3 years or "20,000 hours" ) the bulb now turns itself entirely off and on every 2 seconds making a very light whining sound when doing so. This can become extremely annoying. I only kept it on for 4-5 hours a day, so I know I'm not anywhere near 20k hours. I wonder how far behind the other is from dying.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: It works every time
customer_reviews.text: The app that goes along with this bulb works very well . I have two of these in my home. I have both of them set up with timers and it works every single time just don't forget if the power goes off you need to manually turn it on so it gets back into sync with the application and the timer. my only complaint is when you have a large room it doesn't light it it very well and I wish could be more of a white light than yellow when it comes to the regular mode.
customer_reviews.author: Vyanna

customer_reviews.title: Good hardware software needs some work
customer_reviews.text: Had these in every light socket in my bedroom (6 bulbs)for 3 years now the bulbs have worked well are bright and the hardware is excellent you can leave them on for long hours with no issues my main complaint is that the software needs work and rarely gets updated the software dose not feel very elegant and there is a lot of steps to do simple tasks that should be one button also support for the newest Apple Watch os has still not been implemented after almost a year????? Great product but software kills it from being competitive with higher end brands
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality bulb, Spotty phone app
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bulb to function as an artificial "sunrise" during the winter months. While it does serve that function well, the interface in the accompanying iPhone app is not particularly user friendly. At times the app will also lose it's "link" with the bulb if the phone's Bluetooth radio is turned off (such as to preserve phone battery life) and then turned back on again, requiring the lamp to turned off/on again as well. I also have some concern regarding the product life given that it's dependent upon a proprietary phone application in order to use the advanced functionality.
customer_reviews.author: itslow

customer_reviews.title: It works like intended but the color range is too limited for my liking.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome seller, received the item in a timely manner. I am using the Flux app on an iPhone 6 and it works like a charm pairing the bulb to my phone. You can customize the light color and brightness but more work could be put into the app so you can fine tune the RGB values. The main drawback for me was that I couldn't find a good warm orangy-yellow color from the color wheel that suited my lighting style. It just wouldn't give me the color I was looking for. Overall, I would say it's a good product if you want to control your light from your phone and not too picky about the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Yuhan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth a shot if you're trying to save the monies
customer_reviews.text: I, personally, use this bulb as a sunlight alarm to aid in my stubborn sleeping habits. So far, as that, it works quite well. It also has a myriad of other novelty options that I've used once and will probably never use again. Past that, the widget design is a little "meh" and it's responsiveness to being turned on or off is a little laggy (around 4 seconds was my longest wait time). I'd still recommend it as a versatile bedtime lamp or sunrise light alarm alternative.
customer_reviews.author: V. Werner

customer_reviews.title: Adds a lot of character
customer_reviews.text: The colors are great. Pink is like T mobile level pink and all the other colors are amazing as well. The white is a quality soft white.. All colors can be set to a custom brightness and you can also set it to turn on at a set time which I find useful waking up
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not a "60 Watt Equivalent - Classic" as advertised
customer_reviews.text: At the top of the page, right underneath the price, the size is stated to be 60W equivalent. Below that starts a very long-winded description, the last sentence of which includes"...comparable to a 50W incandescent bulb, ...". If you then click on "See More Product Details" you will go to "Product information Size:60 Watt Equivalent - Classic Technical Details" Down toward the bottom of that list you can see "Incandescent equivalent 40 Watts". I bought this to match one of the same model purchased 1 year ago. They don't match: the new one is shorter and obviously not nearly as bright. The manufacturer is making a different bulb, but Amazon did not change the description. It is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Rick VW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect-o
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sister, she loves it. I got this one to see if the family would be amiable to setting up a smart lighting system in the house. It's *almost* the same size as a regular incandescent -- slightly bigger at the bulb/base lip. Might be a problem if installing in recessed lighting if yours is the 'can' kind -- it was a tight fit in ours. If you do want to set this up throughout your house -- get the wifi one instead. We got this one because we don't have a wifi router yet.
customer_reviews.author: B I.

customer_reviews.title: and the warm light looks just like a regular lightbulb
customer_reviews.text: Don’t expect to use the music feature unless you have iTunes premium plus special, it can’t play Spotify YouTube or pandora, that’s a given even though it’s 2018... the only way to play music is connect to iTunes. No here’s the problem, it doesn’t play standard format so you have to upgrade your iTunes TWO times to get songs you want then change the format... other then that the bulb has a lot of colors, and the warm light looks just like a regular lightbulb, it’s very responsive and has loads of features. It turns on in less then a second, I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Bright bulb
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my dad and he absolutely loved it. With the application you can 1) dim or turn off the bulb (it's extremely bright at it's highest setting! better than our normal light bulb) 2) strobe the light, using one color or multiple AND control the speed 3) set the light sensitive to sound; it will only turn on when there is sound -- the louder the sound, the brighter the bulb gets 4) have the bulb "dance" to music on your phone ( 5) set a timer for the bulb and its colors I haven't even played with the app thoroughly, but this bulb is already great.
customer_reviews.author: Pocky Cubes

customer_reviews.title: This lightbulb is definitely high quality and has awesome features and settings
customer_reviews.text: This lightbulb is definitely high quality and has awesome features and settings. I love that I can turn my lights off from other rooms, or even outside! I use it for the sunrise function, and it's great. It comes on with my alarm, and never fails. The only reason I give this 4 stars instead of 5 is that the gradual brightening of the light isn't very gradual, and it starts out so bright that it wakes me up instantly, rather than slowly like natural sunrises. I do have fun changing the colors to help with mood and relaxation though!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great starter for smart homes!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have wifi so this was a must have for my apartment. Syncs up nicely to phone and the app is solid. Has a timer function that lets you set when the lights come on and off. A lot of other functionality within the app. Custom light settings, any color you can imagine (I typically only use 3 different colors) Sometimes you lose connection but you can always just restart the app or take out the light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great bulb, not so great app
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality light bulb. It works great and feels fairly sturdy for its build. It lights up a specific area very well. This type of light bulb isn't to be bought to light up a whole room, if facing 1 way. The superlight sold by the same company would probably work better for you. The light bulb is quality overall. The app on the other hand could use some work on it. I wish it had more effects and perhaps some presets, perhaps "dawn" or "forest" etc. It's a solid app, don't get me wrong, but it seems a bit too simple. I wish it had more customization. Overall though, the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Flux Bluetooth LED Light
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these for mood lighting in our bedroom. The set up was easy and the lights work well. I wish they were brighter and you could use the dimmer to lower the brightness but at max lighting they are somewhat dim. I would recommend these based on the price compared to Phillips Hue but the Hue probably gets brighter. We have not used the multiple settings such as music or flashing but the app includes those settings.
customer_reviews.author: DaddyMac

customer_reviews.title: light up the dark
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other "cheaper" brands but this one stands up to the test of time! Very pleased! The app is intuitive and will remember the settings once setup so there's no need to sync to your phone every night if you're using the Sunrise feature. Speaking of, this is the main reason I bought this bulb and it's great. The only downside is that the sunrise/sunset features only work for the "standard" white light, no custom colors available for that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dioclese

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty neat light
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty neat light, controlled from my android phone via Bluetooth. After having it a week, I've realized that I won't use the multi-color function at all. I don't have parties in my house or have kids. but there is a nifty timer function that will turn the light on and off whenever you want. it is supposed to last pretty much forever too...I have it on my desk and change the brightness and the tone of normal white light from cool to warm depending on my mood. Overall excellent product, I wish it had wifi like the "LIFX" bulbs...but at a cost of nearly half....I'll take it :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is just a great product and after a lot of shopping around I can tell you it is the best value on the market. The colors are limitless and you can adjust the brightness in addition to the color to get exactly the look you want. I ran two sets on my planter shelves so the strips are out of view, but the colors bathe my ceiling and it looks amazing. To top it off their customer service is fast, helpful, and friendly. I recommend these to anybody that is looking for a very affordable and creative lighting solution for their home.
customer_reviews.author: Shades of Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good light/decent app
customer_reviews.text: really responsive, doesn't need a hub light the Hue lights, because it connects directly with bluetooth. Might be a little pricey for some people, but the quality of the bulb is good, and the colors are great. When I have a little extra cash to blow, I'll probably pick up a couple more of these. I think the app could use some work, but it works well enough to not take a star away.
customer_reviews.author: Blake W.

customer_reviews.title: Fun little product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light bulb to try in a lamp in my bedroom. It's a pretty fun product. The app works well, but the setup instructions for Android could have been a little clearer. (It's actually simpler to setup, than the instructions indicate) It has a few modes, including strobe, color shifting, and color change to musical beats. However, I usually use it for ambient lighting (warm yellow), with the dimmer function. I have tried the different colors and sort of fun changing the light to suit the mood. It's fun, it works, with all the energy saving benefits of LEDs, and the best thing is, I can turn off the light from bed with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: AverageJoe

customer_reviews.title: Very COOL! I programmed the bulb to fade to a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very COOL! I programmed the bulb to fade to a deep red at bedtime and back up to full daylight in the morning - all from the phone-based app. Like many bluetooth gadgets these days the Flux app hiccups in a bluetooth-rich environment (a bluetooth multi-point problem with BT 4.0+) But once connected, the app gives dynamic access to the RGB color functions in the Smart Bulb. Another Mark Cuban homerun, IMO. Great fun for gadget freaks!
customer_reviews.author: Viewer Pro

customer_reviews.title: A real five star!! Came back and order two more.
customer_reviews.text: Just received my bulb today and only regret was that I didn't order two. So easy to setup and the selection of colors is amazing. I liked them so much I came back and ordered two more. Such a great value and ease in operation. I even set one up on a timer.
customer_reviews.author: NormD.

customer_reviews.title: Always disconnects.
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. It always disconnects from my iPhone. I have an older version of this bulb and it performs well. The one I purchased in 2018 constantly needs to be reconnected. I would try a different brand next time. I do like being able to dim the light to the exact brightness level I want, so I’ll continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Deerfield

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was curious about mutlicolor LED bulbs like the HUE, but was hesitant to spend the much higher price for that product. I saw this for and bought it on a lark. Overall, I've been very pleased. It has a great variety of colors and has lots of color modes I never use. The main purposes for me were to be able to set alarms and to adjust color temperature in the evenings. For these, it's great. I'm giving it four stars because the app is a little slow and wonky. The interface isn't particularly nice, but it works. I'd definitely more of these as needed.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Very cool lights and excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Flux bulbs create a new dimension to a room through the use of color, brightness, and various transitions. They really enhance your space and are super easy to control with a smartphone. More than worth the price! Even better in meditative states of consciousness. One of the bulbs in my original order did have a malfunction but after troubleshooting with the supplier, Red Mountain e-Store, and determining the bulb was flawed, a replacement bulb was promptly sent to me. Mr. Karthik really cares about his customers and his product.
customer_reviews.author: Evil Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are awesome; I've got them on the front of the house with a timer function to complement a smart light on the porch. I love that the color can be easily changed to show pride for a sporting team, a holiday, etc. The only frustrating part is that you need to cut power to them to repair with a device. Since there is no pairing code, I know there isn't really a way to avoid this. Easiest is just to grab a small cloth, and slightly unscrew and rescrew them in. Overall, 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: No Signature

customer_reviews.title: It works well and the app is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It works well and the app is easy to use. So nice to have the light gradually turn on in the morning and wake up to an already lit bedroom. Makes waking up easier!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased 11 of these so far and they are awesome! The App is really good too
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 11 of these so far and they are awesome! The App is really good too. My wife was really against them but when I showed her the different color schemes and what it can do to a mood or a room, she fell in love. My father in law commented "now all you need is the reefer, and you'll be all set!" Oh, dad, we just hide the reef when you're not here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot.  Very cool product for a low price.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool bulb, and very easy to use, but I SERIOUSLY doubt the thing is capable of 16,000,000 colors. ( I could only count 14,998,993 ;-) I purchased just one, to see how well it works, and to see if it looked like a fluorescent bulb when in the "non colored mode". Although it doesn't look like the old incandescent bulbs, it's going to be close enough. I'm putting them in my basement's can lights, and I'll turn them blue while watching a movie. They're going to work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: The Sib

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: This lightbulb is AMAZING. I love being able to use the app to turn it off at night to go to bed and in the morning when I leave the house (my lamp is in a weird/awkward place to reach because of the layout of my bedroom). The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because I wish the regular lamp setting could be brighter, it seems pretty dim (but I also have bad eyesight so it could just be me). Either way, I thought I was crazy for dropping almost $40 on a light bulb but it's definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bronte

customer_reviews.title: POW!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Smart LED Light bulb. Great features in the app that works very well. Very simple and easy to use with loads of options to customize to your liking. So much so, after my first bulb came I ordered two more right away to space around my entire living room. Great for movie mood (I use a deep blue on all three bulbs) and it's fantastic. I would highly recommend to friends and family. Go ahead an buy a few, you shouldn't be disappointed. Also, the seller kept in constant contact as well to make sure I was completely satisfied with my purchase (a bonus). Great customer service. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: bfl428

customer_reviews.title: Dim, Defective - Flux is a flop
customer_reviews.text: Not at bright as I'd hoped. I got the 10 watt version after the 7 watt version was very dim. 10 watt is still quite dim. White light shines as very blue, warm light looks pretty good. After a few weeks of ownership I've started to have problems with the bulb. It will occasionally flicker and dim like there is a short or something like that. I'm in an environment where wifi controlled bulbs are not an option, so if you need bluetooth know that this is just "okay." The scheduling feature on the app is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jase Howland

customer_reviews.title: Can only use the app.
customer_reviews.text: This light isn't a true Bluetooth light. You can connect to the light through Bluetooth only through the app. You cant connect a phone to the light with the Bluetooth on the phone, only through the app. The app and color control does work great, but you can't stream any music through the app. No Spotify or Pandora or any streaming content. Just the music stored on your device. That should be mentioned in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheaper option than a WIFI bulb...it does work well, both iOS and Android apps let you control the color, brightness, or predefined actions... and it works pretty well. The only thing that bugs me a bit is that it allows one BT connection at a time. So if my wife connects via the app to it, and then doesn't kill the app, just lets it live in the background, I can't connect to it from my device. With wifi, the problem would not exist, but BT is limited this way...
customer_reviews.author: Piotr Szewello

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive! Especially given the price vs other more well known brands.
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty impressed by these. I have a couple iLumi bulbs and although I can't say these are better than those, those _are_ 3 times as expensive as these but they most certainly are _NOT_ 3 times as better as this simple yet impressive bulb. The only real gain the other more expensive ones have over these is brightness. They are not the brightest, so for a main light source it's not the best but for night lamps, it cannot be beaten for the price. I'm pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: H2O

customer_reviews.title: Hit and miss
customer_reviews.text: There is a huge issue with the connectivity of this product via bluetooth and a pairing issue. I have four bulbs and two strips in total. Two of the strips are in my bedroom, along with one bulb. I have one Bulb in my hallway and two in the living room and I have to constantly reset them all. This product is not reliable and I should have just purchased the Phillips Hue system. When it does work, the lights are amazing, which is why i'm giving it two stars.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Good app, bright and colorful, but Bluetooth connection is spotty at best.
customer_reviews.text: I installed these bulbs outside on my porch and above my garage. They worked great, except that I couldn't connect to all of them simultaneously unless I stood outside within 10 ft of each device. When they are connected, the app works great and the lights have a great assortment of modes and colors. Used them for Christmas and they put out bright red and green light with no problems. My only issue is that the lights wouldn't maintain time on the Schedule mode, so they wouldn't turn off and back on. I resorted to just leaving them on all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Dtlaco01

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful or bright but it has a few neat functions for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's better than some of the cheaper versions of LIFX and Hue but it does not compare to the main brands. It's not very bright and the color choices aren't as plentiful. It's ok for a lamp to give a little color to a desk area but not a whole room. I would not recommend this for actual home lighting. Small isolated areas are ok for ambient mood adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Jessicka

customer_reviews.title: I really like this lightbulb
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lightbulb to pander to my laziness. I was tired of getting out of bed to turn the overhead light off (I hate lamps) after reading to my daughter at bedtime. I can control this from my iPad or iPhone and let's face it, it's just cool! My kids love choosing light colors and dancing to the music/light combinations. I would love to buy more of these and have Alexa (my Amazon Echo) control them however, she does not work with this brand which is a pity.
customer_reviews.author: A Nonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are awesome!! They came packaged nicely and were ready to use right of the box. The app is easy to use and allows you to program the bulbs in so many different ways! I love the ability to change the colors and brightness to match any mood. They come with a great warranty too. We couldn't be happier with our purchase and have already recommended these bulbs to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Ilg

customer_reviews.title: Good bluetooth bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning these because apparently I can't read lol. I didn't want bluetooth bulbsI wanted bulbs that would work with my wifi setup and for some reason I didn't see the word bluetooth in the title. lol that's on me. I did take one of the bulbs out and tried it and it worked great no issues easy to pair with app.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: The way of the future!
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth light bulbs are the lights of the future. No more will you need to get up to turn your light off or even dim it down for low light levels. This is a great product that is extremely easy to use and built really well. I've had these installed for around 6 months now and they always keep my day bright (yes, they are bright!) The only reason this was rated 4/5 was due to their app as others have said. While it works, it could be a little less klunky than it is. I would love it if there was a way to control it programmatically it, but I digress.
customer_reviews.author: David Howell

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the price and doesn't require anything else. I use it instead of an alarm clock with the programmable turn on feature and to take the blue out of the lights at night before bed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 15 days!
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this bulb, I was so excited. It worked really well, besides the fact that normal white light was quite dim. Today, 15 days after receiving this bulb, I go to turn on my light using the app, and the light doesn't show up in the app. I refreshed the app many times, with the same result. The app is the only way to turn this light on, so now it's not even a lightbulb. Definitely going back.
customer_reviews.author: Ganesh Ramamoorthy

customer_reviews.title: I thought they were awesome and the coolest thing ever
customer_reviews.text: At first I was excited. I thought they were awesome and the coolest thing ever. A few months after one bulb decided to not respond to adjustments on the phone and it was noticeable dimmer than the other. It would also flicker at times. Other complaint is when you turn on the light switch it takes a second or two for the lights to actually come on which isn't a huge deal but the one bulb not working is the deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: If you want a versatile LED bulb with multiple features, look no further!
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting something a little nicer then just a 1 color bulb for my Halloween setup, and this works out just great. The app lets you customize the colors you want to fade, making this a bit better then the LED that just has the remote. I wanted a yellow fading light, and this one already has a pre-set yellow fade. If you are on the fence, buy it! This thing is great, also the seller has e-mailed me following up, so it seems as if they want to make sure everything was great. Highly recommended item.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Cheap bulb that can do so much
customer_reviews.text: This isn't philips hue but it's a great bargain for what it does. You can control colors, warmth, you can even have it change color to the music. They also sell ones that connect via wifi. This one uses bluetooth and pairing was quite simple. App needs work but bulb's features are great. It also has ability to automatically turn on and off at the schedules you set. Make sure you never turn off the switch on the wall but use your phone to turn the bulb on and off. Reason is if you power cycle it, it forgets the schedules.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesism

customer_reviews.title: Novelty wears off fast. only can connect to one ...
customer_reviews.text: Novelty wears off fast. only can connect to one device at a time. the bright white, is not all the bright. My wife thinks the other colors are just weird.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT'S VERY COOL AND FUNCTIONAL
customer_reviews.text: IT'S VERY COOL AND FUNCTIONAL. THE FUNCTION "SUNRISE " HELPS ME A LOT TO WAKE UP IN THE MORNING. IT AUTOMATICALLY TURNS ON AT THE TIME YOU SET UP YOUR ALARM. ALL THE COLORS ARE NICE, AND YOU CAN EVEN MAKE YOUR OWN COLORS AND SAVE IT. THE APP YOU DOWNLOAD HAS MANY FUNCTIONS AND WORKS GREAT. I'M VERY SATISFIED WITH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Janina

customer_reviews.title: Works Great -
customer_reviews.text: This bulb works great. I purchased one as a test and plan on getting a few more for my outdoor kitchen area. I plan on using the color adjusting to help keep the bugs at bay ( avoid the blue end of the spectrum) and going red to help with the night vision when I have the telescope out. My first bulb was DOA but the replacement worked fine. If there is a weakness it is that the yellow tones are more greenish but I am also somewhat colorblind so it could just be a personal problem.
customer_reviews.author: Crapulence

customer_reviews.title: Other than a weird app issue, great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the product. My only quibble is that the android version of the app only allows you to group 4 bulbs. As we have ours in a 5-bulb fixture, this is kind of annoying. Thankfully my wife has an iPhone and that app allows groups of 5, so she can control them together. it's an odd issue, but the bulbs are great otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Matt Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because they are a bit pricey, but there is no doubt that these things are awesome!! I have 3 in the living room and 2 in the bedroom. At first I thought they were annoying because you had to turn them on and off with only your phone - not so - if you just use the switch on your wall it will turn them off then they will turn back on the color scheme they were last set on. It's fun to play with the strobe effects - between 2 lights you can make it look like police are in the house. Great and fun product! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Razel42

customer_reviews.title: A smart light bulb
customer_reviews.text: I initially had a problem in getting the app you need to operate the light and its colors remotely. The company sent me a link to the app. How kind they were to do that. I have the app but have not had a chance to test it. Right now its "white" which for the moment is just fine. I've decided to return it; I'm not of an age where I need remotely changing lights even if the remote actually worked which using my smartphone, it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Luise Healey

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great Bluetooth light bulb! I find the app works great! It is pretty easy to navigate and easy to create patterns and tones. Just a heads up, the metal outside of the bulb gets VERY hot and could cause you to drop it or burn yourself. I have had no problems with the Bluetooth connection, I think it works fine. I can get pretty far away and still control the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Babcock

customer_reviews.title: I really like this LED bulb
customer_reviews.text: I really like this LED bulb. However, I cannot give it a 5-star rating because there seems to be interference with my wifi while it is screwed into the socket. I use my phone's (iPhone 5S) internet connection to watch Apple TV, Netflix and surf the web (I have unlimited 4G LTE from Verizon). Since I installed these lights (8 of them) I have extended buffering times and most movies/shows are impossible to watch. I am still looking to find some kind of work around or fix for these LEDs because I do like the concept a lot, not to mention the potential energy savings. Will update with solutions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool bulb, great seller, crappy app
customer_reviews.text: The lightbulb itself is pretty great - lots of fun, and good for cozy bedtime reading. The app is not good, though. The color on the wheel in no way corresponds to the color of the light produced by the bulb. You have to just fiddle with it until it lands where you want it. Five stars because Red Mountain E-Store, the seller, went above and beyond when I thought the bulb had broken and contacted them.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Great lightbulb
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got an amazon gift card for her birthday and wanted to order a smart lightbulb. It has all kinds of really cool features. You can change the color of the light. You can even customize the color of the light with a picture. It is all controlled with your smartphone. My daughter showed me all the features when we got it. I will defiantly buy more of these for my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna N

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, couple things I wish it had
customer_reviews.text: It's super cool, the timer function is super useful, and it can be just as bright as any other light bulb. I wish there was a way to make it turn off if my phone went a certain distance away so I don't have to worry about turning on/off the lights. You can preset light colors but not brightness, so if you want to have a darker color you have to turn down brightness manually. But really, I think it's a great product, and even though I only have 1 of them, I'd definitely buy more if I had more places to put them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Krein

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use...
customer_reviews.text: Eight months and still works, wakes me up, not sure if phone needs to be on for app to tell light to wake me up, the disco mode requires phones microphone to work. Does not require wifi connection which is good, only needs app on phone and bluetooth to work, very simple and inexpensive to use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Riley

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: The Flux Bluetooth light bulb is an impressive product. It was exactly what I was looking for to add some cool colors to my dorm room using lights. The bulb itself produces rich colors and offers lots of ways to personalize your room beyond the capabilities of an ordinary light bulb. It worked exactly as I hoped with no flaws or complications and was a great purchase. The product was shipped and delivered quickly and packaged very securely. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is a fairly good product, however I have a few issues
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a fairly good product, however I have a few issues: 1) The RGB LEDs are nowhere near as bright as the warm white LEDs 2) The "cool white"/RGB white setting is not calibrated properly, and shows as an off-purple 3) The app is one of the worst things I've ever had the displeasure of seeing. Otherwise, I feel it was worth the price paid for it, as it does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great light, but not a speaker....(duh to me)
customer_reviews.text: Awesome light, does everything it should...side note, in case you get excited and miss important details sometimes while shopping, THIS IS ONLY A LIGHT, IT DOES NOT HAVE A SPEAKER! I don't fault the seller for this, just a lack of attention to detail on my part. But the light really is neat, tons of colors, now I need to plan a party so I can use my light 😀👍💡🍻
customer_reviews.author: lola scratch n sniff

customer_reviews.title: Better in theory than in practice
customer_reviews.text: It is very cool to be able to program the color. I'm using it on a lamp post outside. Most of the bulb is the gray covering for the controls (I guess), so the bulb is less than half exposed. It is a pretty small area that lights up. I have been able to set on and off on my phone, but every time somebody touches the light switch, those programmed controls have to be reset. The directions for use are not exceptionally clear, in my opinion. I was considering purchasing two more of these, now not so sure.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: I like to turn on my light before I go upstairs ...
customer_reviews.text: It only works with one device, meaning my husband can't use it simultaneously. The app has so many features that it does not have the feature to let you know if the light is on or off. I like to turn on my light before I go upstairs but I can tell if it worked or not. So I need a bluetooth bulb that can work on other devices in case I am not at home or do not have my device near me.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Watkins

customer_reviews.title: this works fine for movie night
customer_reviews.text: Used these in the bedroom, and they work well. Used 1 in my living room where there's 1 switch that controls power to two ceiling fans and a light, so instead of changing the wiring to independently switching off the light, this works fine for movie night!
customer_reviews.author: Doland

customer_reviews.title: quality bulb I wish could do 2850 K
customer_reviews.text: certainly pairs well with newer smartphone and tablet devices, app is great! I don't care for the Party colors, but I really like the alarm feature I really hope the next gen version concentrate on getting more color temperatures and not so much of the party colors If it could go from 2000K to 2850 K that would be amazing
customer_reviews.author: Adventure Dave

customer_reviews.title: I do like this bulb
customer_reviews.text: I do like this bulb. The customer service was even better. After 2 weeks the bulb blew. Sent an email to the support link. 5 days later they sent me another one. No complaints. I don’t know if it’s worth $30 plus. I would by another one though
customer_reviews.author: Jayraw44

customer_reviews.title: Good for a table but not for a room
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and get working but the brightness is very disappointing. I put it in the ceiling fixture and it doesn't light up the room well enough. Will probably be moving it to a table lamp instead. In the photo I have the Flux light on one side in putple and another nonchanging led on the ither side in red.. The red light completely overpowers the flux light and even both kf them together do not adequetly light up the room.
customer_reviews.author: David L Condrey

customer_reviews.title: Best used in a lamp IMO
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great for accent lighting Helps me get up in the morning with "timed turned on" feature Lots of customization including playing with music, using your camera to select a color, and function presets Cons: App can be clunky Color picking on a phone screen can be cumbersome "White" light isn't really white Some colors are too dim even at full brightness
customer_reviews.author: Ry R.

customer_reviews.title: best morning I can remember in a long time
customer_reviews.text: Loving it so far. I have it in a lamp in my bedroom to wake up more gently than an alarm; best morning I can remember in a long time. I should add that if you're buying it for the colors, some of them are slightly noisy in their darker ranges. Of course my husband says I can hear a gnat fart in the next room, so it may not bother you. I found a nice pale coral that simulates a sunrise that I can't hear. Just ordered another!
customer_reviews.author: C. Xavier

customer_reviews.title: I was on the fence also. Glad I chose to give it a shot!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Amazing!!! AMAZING!!!!! I was originally going to go with Sylvania Mosaic for my recording studio lighting just to add the AWE effect. It didn't quite work the way I needed. Now the Flux Bluetooth Smart LED... wow. Any and every color you can imagine. I was worried about brightness. They are plenty bright. Yeah they are expensive, but depending on what you need to use them for it may be well worth not having the hassle of working with something that doesn't quite work the way you need it to. If I were you, I'd at least get one and see what you think. I'm glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: David Escobedo

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. In my room because I live in a old house there is no switch for the light. Everytime I had to go to the light and turn it on manually. This little cool led light allows me to control my light everytime, while laying in the bad. I love the blue color as well when I want to relax. It actually has an UVish effect where white colors glow (not quite as much as an UV but it does something). It is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Giulio

customer_reviews.title: Great lights, great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two bulbs initially. When they arrived one did not work. The seller quickly responded and sent a replacement. Now I have two working Flux bulbs and they're great. I just ordered two more. They're easy to set up and use and they provide exactly what I was looking for. Rather than spend $100's on a competitive bulb that does the same thing, i recommend these. The app is easy to navigate and the bulbs can be individually manipulated or grouped as one. If you're into lighting, like I am; these are a must.
customer_reviews.author: Rockulus

customer_reviews.title: Good bulb. Works well. Could be nicer.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Not as bright as I thought it would be, but I like it a lot. I have a timer set to turn the light on an orange yellow color 5 minutes before my alarm clock goes off. Has made waking up easier for me. One issue, you definitely CANNOT get 16 million colors with this app. There are way more than needed but the color selection is not precise enough to select that many different colors. I might get another one if I see it on sale, just to have the room as bright as I wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: chas

customer_reviews.title: LOVE then.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Literally have left 5hese om since we got them over a year ago. The app to control them works great on our Android phones and we use them for a calm backlighting behind/around TV. One of the best buys I've ever had...have 4 and will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: McAlldp

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift, but he loves them so much, would buy again (maybe even for myself!)
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought these for my brother, so I can't speak from personal experience about the ease of installation / setting up the app and etc. But he's in love with them and showed me how they work, they are so cool! I have dyed pink hair currently and he was able to hold the app up to my head to get the lights to appear the same color as my hair. So cool. Based on the fact that my brother is obsessed with these bulbs and the ability to control them from his phone, I'm giving them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Unable to Connect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these bulbs, but after several hours, still have not been able to establish a Bluetooth connection using a friend's iPhone 5 or my own Nexus 6. With the iPhone, the bulbs appeared in the app, but had no functionality. With the Nexus 6, the Bluetooth could see the bulbs, but not establish a connection because a PIN was required. There are no instructions for this situation. I have tried cycling through on/off for the lights, the app, and the phone with no success. As of now, these are basically regular light bulbs, which at $30, is way too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Marylander

customer_reviews.title: I own three. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first bulb about a month before the second two to fill out a standing lamp I have and I love them. I have an iPhone 6 plus, and use the bulbs for about 6 hours every night. I waited about a month before reviewing just incase anything went wrong, but they're working well. The app is just fine and responsive, despite my worries after reading the negative reviews. After being on for hours they're barely warm to the touch, which is great and was a worry of mine initially. I wanted bluetooth bulbs for a while and this was a great first experience. I would suggest these to anybody thinking of buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Alain S.

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright but very enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bulb for those who want to spice up their room's lighting. The speed at which the color changes is very, very smooth which surprised me because I expected some latency. The only downside is that it's not too bright. You won't want to use this to replace your primary source of light. It's better to use as a bulb for parties or just to have a dim room in the evening/night to relax in. I have personally placed this in a lamp which I use to stay up at night while everyone is sleeping. Love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Motiur

customer_reviews.title: Programs/Timers Worked Fine
customer_reviews.text: So far works exactly as described. Almost infinite number of color options to choose from. I had no trouble connecting to the bulb with my Samsung Galaxy S4 phone with Android version 5.0.1. I used it in my ceiling lamps mainly for security purposes and scheduled timers to turn the lights on and off automatically at different times of the day. Just make sure your light switched is left on. I have not dropped it yet but seems to be very durable. The entire bulb is a hard plastic, no glass. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: bgbon

customer_reviews.title: Ok bulb, terrible suftware.
customer_reviews.text: meh. the bulb is ok, but you can either have soft-white or colors, and the colors are relatively dim and not very well balanced. the software is so dumb it's smart again. I can blink red green, but I can't transition soft white from off to full-on, or select such a transition for wake-up. Works only with it's own totally irritating app that has tons of bugs (for instance the alarms all display wrong). Also, if somebody accidentally flips the light-switch, you can start over, as the app remembers NOTHING.
customer_reviews.author: Monika W

customer_reviews.title: This bulb is awesome. I programmed it to go on and off ...
customer_reviews.text: This bulb is awesome. I programmed it to go on and off on the timer mode and I love adjusting the color. You can program multiple timers which is awesome. I love that you can adjust the brightness. It is alittle difficult to program as the instructions are vague but if I could figure it out then anyone can. I plan on buying some more. Very satisfied with this purchase and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: L. S. Pobega

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for a friend and he's taken advantage of every feature offered. I've been so impressed with this that I had to buy one for myself. I love the different colors, though I find that most of the time I just use the brightest warm option. Love that I can have any color that I want, when I want it. Its been super convenient to be able to control this from my phone. Only note at all, it isn't very bright, except when you are using it in the warm feature. It would be great if it could be brighter.
customer_reviews.author: T McAvoy

customer_reviews.title: So much fun for parties
customer_reviews.text: So much fun for parties, birthdays, or just mood lighting. I use this as my personal light and love controlling it from anywhere in the house. The only problem I had was when I left one day my phone disconnected from the Bluetooth bulb. When I returned it wouldn't reconnect to the bulb. However this is easy to fix, simply flip off the light switch unscrew the bulb. Wait a few minutes, screw back in and reopen the flux app.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Davis

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as an alternative to the an expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an alternative to the an expensive "wake up light." I wanted a light that I could time to come on gradually, and was able to do that with this light.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Good multi-color light bulb
customer_reviews.text: The bulb itself doesn't feel cheap and as far as its function it works as advertised. The Bluetooth app is easy to install, although I don't know why it needs permission to access your location. There are plenty of colors to choose from on the app. I would say the brightness of the bulb is more for ambience purposes since it isn't super bright. Overall it's what I expected and I definitely like it.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Updated: App ruined this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have to change my rating from 5 stars to 1. Originally this product was amazing, but a recent update to the App on android and Iphone have made it so i cant control the lights one by one, and in fact if i didn't have them already grouped, it wouldn't work at all. I have tried resetting them and they wont show back up as individual lights. Until the app is fixed I would not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this bulb
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bulb. Works great. I can change the bulb output color to a wide variety of colors to suit any mood. I love setting it to blue while watching tv and getting ready for bed. You can set it to fade in and out of several colors and the setting to have the light dance to the music is great. The app is very user friendly and you can control each individual bulb or group them together by room to control multiple bulbs with the touch of your finger. No more coming home to a dark house.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: This bulb is so amazing! One of the best products I have bought ...
customer_reviews.text: This bulb is so amazing! One of the best products I have bought on amazon. Worth the price. One thing im not sure of is life expectancy but this bulb has multiple features because of the bluetooth app capeability. Colors all look great and bright. One thing that amazed me was it works exactly like a black light! If not better! Im talking about neon colors glowing! In conclusion great product and I bought 2 so far and planning on buying much more!
customer_reviews.author: alejandro santillanes

customer_reviews.title: It doesnt allow me to play music that I have ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt allow me to play music that I have on my itunes because theyre technically not paid for (i pay itunes music monthly) i dont know if thats why but it doesnt do the light effects with music. And i just used it for a day.. and it just died. Talk about short life bulb...eh thumbs down
customer_reviews.author: BMoon

customer_reviews.title: Good bulb, atrocious app.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it's a great bulb. Bright with nice colors. The reason for the 1 star is their terrible app with mandatory location harvesting. The app will literally not let you control bulbs if you disable location or location permission now. Go elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lefko

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun way to get started with "smart" light bulbs. I ordered it as a gift for my daughter and she appears to be enjoying it. However, I only gave it 4 stars because the App that supports it is a bit intrusive in the type of permissions it requires and also because it lacks integration with Alexa (Amazon's Echo Dot).
customer_reviews.author: francho

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I was VERY excited to receive this light bulb in the mail and luckily it only came in a matter of days (about 3). PROS: -Much functionality in the app -Clear instructions included to install app (for both iphone and android) -Unlimited colors -Completely customizable light show modes -Bulb is controlled by bluetooth so it can be turned off by simply tapping the power button on the app (or turning off the lamp normally works too) -VERY VERY VERY BRIGHT which means VERY VIBRANT COLORS!!! CONS: -App tweaks out frequently but it has no effect on the bulb
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: This Smart Light is well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in October 2016, and used it to help me "sunrise" function to wake up in the morning. It's brighter than other bulbs I've tried, and the natural yellow light is the color I use the most. Also, it comes with a 2 year warranty (which I had to use recently, and are shipping me another bulb). You really can't go wrong here if you're looking to try one. Customer service was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Bulb for Alarming Wake Up!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially interested in getting this bulb as an augment to my morning wake up alarm. I get up at 4:00 in the morning and now, using the built in red/blue flashing lights from the Flux app, I can do so thinking the cops have invaded my bedroom! Instant wake up! I have had a lot of fun playing with the bazillion color combinations this bulb can generate. The only drawback is that I haven't been able to get the music feature to work. This is a problem with Apple (which is evil) and iTunes (which is stupid), not the Flux app. The other features provided in this bulb/app still warrant five stars..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color changing low power wizardry
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly one of the cooler things I've ever purchased, to be totally honest. Say you're playing videogames, forest area. Turn them green, get some mood lighting. Fire level? Have them alternate between different levels of red, yellow and orange , all different brightnesses. Water level? Turn 'em blue. I wish I could set the strobe effect to only turn certain colors when the microphone detects a noise, but that could be fixed with a software upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Decent for a first step into smart home devices.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little bulb, but I wish I had gotten one that would connect to Wi-Fi instead and be compatible with Alexa or Apple HomeKit. Once you have more than one smart home device, you realize the value of compatibility.
customer_reviews.author: Scott_B

customer_reviews.title: Great Bulb!  Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bulb is unexpectedly bright for the amount of lumens when set to the warm color, love the ability to customize the colors and the functions of the app. Bulb has so far exceeded my expectations. We used this bulb to replace the one incandescent light that came with the RV. All the other lights were already LED's in our RV. This bulb is brighter, puts off far less heat and works really well as a night light, or mood setting bulb. So happy we are replacing some of our in home LED's with these bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Broadwater

product_meta.title: Flux Bluetooth Smart LED Light Bulb - Smartphone Controlled Dimmable Multicolored Color Changing Lights - Works with iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, Android Phone and Tablet
product_meta.description:
Size:60 Watt Equivalent - ClassicFlux is a Bluetooth enabled, multicolor, energy efficient LED light bulb that you can control with your smartphone or other mobile device. 

See your home in a new light with this next generation LED Smart Bulb. The Flux LED Smart Bulb supports a color palette of over 16 million colors and also different tones of white light - from warm yellow white to vibrant blue white. 

Control the ambiance and mood of your room by simply selecting your favorite color from a continuous spectrum of colors, or choose from the 20 pre-programmed color modes, and impress your friend and party guests. 

And installation is a breeze. Simply screw in the LED Smart Bulb, download the free app to your mobile device, and you have the next generation of light bulb at your fingertips. 

Forgot your phone? No problem. The Flux LED Smart Bulb also functions just like a regular light bulb and will light up with the flick of a switch. 

Compatible with iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, iPhone 5c, iPhone 5s, iPad 3, iPad 4 and iPad Mini (Note For iPads please disable iPad only search filter in App Store).
feature_bullets: Set the right ambiance for any moment. Choose from over 16 million colors in the Flux Bluetooth app to match the light to your mood. Relive your favorite memories by setting the light to colors from your favorite photo. Save your favorite light settings and recall them whenever you want with the tap of a finger. Show pride for a sporting team, holiday etc. The possibilities are endless.

With light schedules, Flux Bluetooth can make it seem like you're home when you are not. Set the lights to come on at a pre-set time so you can come home to a bright well lit home or wake up in the morning to your favorite colors. Let the lights turn off gradually at night, so you never have to worry whether you've left any lights on.

Sync light to your favorite music and enjoy every beat to the fullest. Transform any room into a dance floor or create a relaxing and tranquil atmosphere. This is a great way to relax and unwind after a long day.
Light influences our mood, behavior and alertness. Flux Bluetooth can help you relax, provide comfort, energize you or help you concentrate. Customize your light and feel the difference.

Flux bulbs are simple to install and use. Simple screw in the bulb, power it on, download the free "Flux Link" app, and you have the next generation light bulb at your fingertips. It fits in any standard E26 base light fixture and is the size of an A19 bulb. And with a lifetime of 20,000 hours and comparable to a 60W incandescent bulb, you can save money while looking cool.

specifications.Special Features: Built in memory function retains the last color or program mode., Comes with 20 pre-programmed modes like cross fades, strobe etc. App allows you to create your own programs, Requires Bluetooth 4.0 compatible device, Can connect to 50 Flux smart bulbs, Works with iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, iPhone 5c, iPhone 5s, iPad 3, iPad 4, iPad Mini and Android 4.3 or higher.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,892 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
